title: The supply chain may be derailed again
itunes:title: The supply chain may be derailed again
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: We’ve learned just how fragile the global supply chain is the past few years, and we’re not out of the woods yet. Today, we examine two threats to the supply chain’s recovery: a potential strike of U.S. rail workers and continued lockdowns in China. We’ll also take a look at a new merchant code used for gun sales and hear how food banks are grappling with rising food costs.
